Jobspring Partners is a professional IT staffing agency that takes an innovative approach to matching the most qualified IT professionals with organizations that offer rewarding full-time and contract career opportunities. We use a team-based approach to recruiting and work exclusively in the technology communities of ten major North American cities. With a deep understanding of the technology job market, we are able to identify opportunities that best serve the needs of people looking to advance their careers.We go the extra mile to help excellent candidates connect with companies that are looking to hire them. One of the ways we do this is through Tech in Motion, a national event series created by Jobspring that connects tech enthusiasts in ten North American cities. We work around the clock to assist candidates who want to take the next step in their careers. We take the time to meet with each of them individually to better understand their skills and unique needs. We openly invite you to experience our personalized recruiting approach so that we may help you find your next career destination.arielle.abelon@jobspringpartners.com(415) 904-8000

summary: Arielle Abelon graduated from Dominican University of California with a Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, a Concentration in Marketing, and a Minor in Leadership. She was awarded Summa Cum Laude and was among the top 10 percentile of her graduating class. In Spring 2014, Arielle studied abroad at ESCEM in Poitiers, France. Her studies included: European Advertising, Negotiation, European Luxury Goods (concentrating in the fashion and beauty industry), and French language.
